decision_conditions: It is recommended that these trees which are situated at 2 Gidea Close and are with in the Gidea Park Conservation Area can be pruned as follows;
T1-T2 Lawson Cypress, crown reduction by approximately 2m and trim sides by approximately 1m.
T3 purple Leaved Plum, crown reduce-reducing height and spread of tree by up to 2m.
T4 Ash is located on council property at the rear of Royal Jubilee Court and is over hanging the boundary of No 2. Gidea Close-crown reducing height and spread of the tree by up to 2m.
T5 Norway Maple, crown reduction-reducing height and spread of the tree by up to 2m.

Please note that if the work for which consent is granted is not carried out within 2 years of the date of this letter, it will be necessary to submit a fresh application if it is intended to implement the work.
